entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
